alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Northern Lycoming; Schuylkill; Sullivan; Tioga (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 6:33PM EST until December 28 at 12:00AM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Occasional sleet and freezing rain will continue this evening, particularly over the higher elevations. A thin coating of ice could form on untreated surfaces. * WHERE...Schuylkill, Columbia, Tioga, Sullivan and Northern Lycoming Counties. * WHEN...Until midnight EST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on locally slippery road conditions, especially on less traveled secondary roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The coldest temperatures and most of the travel impacts are likely to occur over the higher terrain.
info.instruction: The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Call 5 1 1 or visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway and traffic conditions. To report snow or ice, post to the NWS State College Facebook page, use Twitter @NWSStateCollege, or visit weather.gov/ctp.

area.areaDesc: Columbia; Northern Lycoming; Schuylkill; Sullivan; Tioga
